scripts.docker:serve: docker run -it --rm --name browserd --shm-size=1g -p 3000:3000 -e HEADLESS=true -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bun run dev
scripts.docker:serve:headed: docker run -it --rm --name browserd --shm-size=1g -p 3000:3000 -e HEADLESS=false -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bash -c 'Xvfb :99 -screen 0 1280x720x24 &>/dev/null & sleep 0.2 && DISPLAY=:99 bun run dev'
scripts.docker:test: docker run -i --rm --shm-size=1g -e HEADLESS=true -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bun test
scripts.docker:test:unit: docker run -i --rm --shm-size=1g -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bun test src/**/*.test.ts
scripts.docker:test:integration: docker run -i --rm --shm-size=1g -e HEADLESS=true -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bun test tests/integration/
scripts.docker:test:e2e: docker run -i --rm --shm-size=1g -e HEADLESS=true -v $(pwd):/vercel/sandbox -w /vercel/sandbox browserd-sandbox bun test tests/e2e/
